calculations.name: Book Level 1 NA IRD
calculations.tableau_expression:
//Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau based on Mapping provided by Arun Subramanian -- February 2017
// Modified on 25 May 2017 based on new Mapping provided by Arun Subramanian
// Modified on 29 May 2017 based on new Mapping provided by Arun Subramanian



if [BOOK_LOCATION]= "New York" then "NY Books" 
else case [BOOK_LEVEL1]

when "NOTESACCTSTR" then "STRUCTURED"   //Added by ADF on 7/2/2018
when "TORUSFI" then "STRUCTURED"        //Added by ADF on 7/2/2018
when "NOTESMKTRNF" then "STRUCTURED"

when "NINDR" then "NY Books" 
when "NIRSW" then "NY Books" 
when "NYINFDIR" then "NY Books" 
when "NYIRSWAP" then "NY Books" 


when "SWAPSHEDGE" then "SWAPS"
when "TORFIHEDGE" then "SWAPS"
when "STRATEGIC" then "SWAPS"           //Added by ADF on 7/2/2018
when "TORUSSWAP" then "SWAPS"           //Added by ADF on 7/2/2018

when "TSWP" then "SWAPS"                //Changed by ADF on 7/2/2018

else [BOOK_LEVEL1]
end end
